Description:
Detects Mimikatz DC sync security events

Author: Benjamin Delpy, Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Scott Dermott, Sorina Ionescu
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Mimikatz DC Sync
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where ((eventid = '4662' and (properties like '%replicating directory changes all%' or properties like '%1131f6ad-9c07-11d1-f79f-00c04fc2dcd2%' or properties like '%1131f6aa-9c07-11d1-f79f-00c04fc2dcd2%' or properties like '%9923a32a-3607-11d2-b9be-0000f87a36b2%' or properties like '%89e95b76-444d-4c62-991a-0facbeda640c%') and accessmask = '0x100') and  not (subjectdomainname = 'window manager' or (subjectusername like 'nt aut%' or subjectusername like 'msol_%') or subjectusername like '%$'))
